item.title: Nov_24_practice_problems
item.description: CF2037E Kachina’s Favorite Binary String /* shame did not solve during competition. Just need to notice that if q(l, r - 1) < q(l, r), then v[r] must be one otherwise, v[r] is zero. so n queries can figure out the entire array. another thing that need to pay attention is once q(l, r) == 0, v[r - q(l, r + 1) : l] == 0, and anything that comes before that is 1 */
